Efficient, cost-effective, customer-oriented and sustainable - four pillars that underpin the concept of KTS24.

Hosting providers are increasing and customer needs are growing exponentially. The requirements that customers place on hosting providers are highly variable. We at KTS24 have the vision that good performance can be offered at fair prices. That's why we want to convince in the overloaded market and stand out from the crowd.

Behind the KTS24 brand are confident and experienced minds who work unrestrictedly and relentlessly on the best solutions for our customers. Especially in the area of ​​vServer hosting, we want to offer outstanding solutions for every customer so that every idea can be realized. Especially vServers are suitable for smaller applications, but are not to be underestimated in terms of their capacity and performance. Customers of KTS24 can rely on secure, reliable and modern systems that are only operated in data centers selected by us.

KTS24 also offers a comprehensive range of dedicated servers and colocation. It is important to us to work together with you on the right solution for your service. Our hardware has been carefully selected by us and, if required, we are happy to adapt it to your individual use - for customer orientation we at KTS24 stand by our vision.

KTS24 is characterized not only by noticeable customer proximity, but also by experience. As an enthusiastic eSportsman, the concept of KTS24 is based on its own experience with hosting companies. Our ambitious team has questioned themselves and reflected what needs customers have and how hosting providers can best implement them. Not least due to the exponential increase in providers, the quality of the offerings suffered increasingly. Precisely for this reason we would like to offer our customers a better experience: We have learned our profession from scratch and we know from our own experience exactly what resources, what quality and service customers need.

Since 2013, we have been working on the vision to provide customers with optimal performance at affordable prices. The emphasis is on communication and high-quality support. KTS24 is operated with passion - for example, the managing director himself reads each individual ticket, so that in case of emergency all necessary steps are taken to keep the services of our customers accessible and to optimize them. Our selected data centers set themselves up for this customer proximity and care-free support, so that we at KTS24 like to pass on these amenities to our customers.

Due to some negative experiences, which we already had to make as customers, customer service and support were anchored as a cornerstone in the corporate concept. Our competent supporters and technicians are available to our customers on a daily basis and around the clock. Even beginners with vain problems will be helped immediately.
In our fast-moving and multimedia world, it is becoming increasingly important not to provide performance at the expense of the environment. We see ourselves as a company with a sustainable basic orientation. In order to be competitive and continue to deliver best prices to our customers, we rely on a blend of green energy and a hardware conservation idea. We are constantly interested in optimizing our solutions so that the environment is sustainably helped, if only by small contributions. This idea accompanies the daily work processes at KTS24.


We invite you to convince yourself of our service - with our name we stand for best performance, fair prices, competent support and customer orientation. Your ideas - our implementation - KTS24.com.
